description: First-pass cleanup of meeting transcripts. Backs up the original to .backup/, then overwrites it with a cleaned version. Removes filler words, (Unverified) tags, stuttered words, and applies terminology corrections.

data_files.label: Corrections Dictionary
data_files.description: Map correct terms to their common mistranscriptions. Key = correct form, Values = comma-separated incorrect variants (matched case-insensitively).
